recipe_text: Quantity; 4; Prepare 4 flour tortillas| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of olive oil| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of onion, chopped| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of zucchini, chopped| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of corn kernels| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of black beans, drained and rinsed| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of cheddar cheese, shredded| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of salsa| Untimed; None; Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat| Untimed; None; Add onion, zucchini, and corn to the skillet and cook until softened| Untimed; None; Stir in black beans and cook until heated through| Untimed; None; Place a tortilla on a flat surface| Untimed; None; Sprinkle cheese on one half of the tortilla| Untimed; None; Spoon the vegetable mixture and salsa over the cheese| Untimed; None; Fold the tortilla over the filling| Timed; 600; Cook the quesadilla in a skillet over medium heat for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown| Finish; None; Serve hot and enjoy!
title: Farmer's Market Vegetarian Quesadillas
